title: CoHabit Mobile Application Design
longSummary: CoHabit is a roommate matching and home-management mobile app designed for students. I led user research, wireframing, and high-fidelity prototyping. The project focuses on roommate compatibility, chore assignment, and shared grocery lists.

title: StarFish Redesign
longSummary: A complete UI redesign for StarFish, improving accessibility, navigational flow, and onboarding for student users. I conducted usability testing and implemented an accessible color system.
